about_the_game:
Mega Flying World is your gateway to crafting an array of awe-inspiring locations!

Dive into the realm of creativity and unleash your imagination as you design Flying Islands, Bee Farms, Lush Gardens, Bustling Restaurants, Vibrant Markets, Charming Village Streets, Bustling Towns, Quaint Village Train Stations, and explore the mysteries of the Colorful Forest, Enigmatic Fog Forest, Magical Winter Forest, Blooming Pink Blossom Forest, Mysterious Dry Forest, and intricate rock formations.

And the adventure doesn't end there – with summer and winter editions, your possibilities are limitless.

This remarkable set empowers your level design dreams with an abundance of assets. Let your creativity soar!

Contents:

・Characters:59X

・Parallaxes:9X

・Tilesets:64X

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
Mega Flying World is your gateway to crafting an array of awe-inspiring locations!

Dive into the realm of creativity and unleash your imagination as you design Flying Islands, Bee Farms, Lush Gardens, Bustling Restaurants, Vibrant Markets, Charming Village Streets, Bustling Towns, Quaint Village Train Stations, and explore the mysteries of the Colorful Forest, Enigmatic Fog Forest, Magical Winter Forest, Blooming Pink Blossom Forest, Mysterious Dry Forest, and intricate rock formations.

And the adventure doesn't end there – with summer and winter editions, your possibilities are limitless.

This remarkable set empowers your level design dreams with an abundance of assets. Let your creativity soar!

Contents:

・Characters:59X

・Parallaxes:9X

・Tilesets:64X

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
